The Ears Have Walls: A Survey of Sound Games

Dec 1, 2017

The Ears Have Walls: A Survey of Sound Games
Curated by Chaz Evans and Stephan Moore December 1, 2017 – February 25, 2018

The exhibition spans two locations:

VGA Gallery: 2418 W Bloomingdale Ave 102

Experimental Sound Studio Audible Gallery: 5925 N Ravenswood Ave

Opening reception @ VGA Gallery, Friday, December 1, 5-8pm
